title: UIDiagonal, a tvOS controller inspired by Hulu's splash screen
author: rezashirazian
content: readme.md uidiagonaluidiagonal is interactive tvos controller inspired hulu's tvos splash screen. user select item the uidiagonalview using siri remote.uidiagonal uses focus engine navigate one cell another.original hulu tvos splash screen:uidiagonal controller implementation:uidiagonal automatically resizes depending the number cells:3 items:14 items:
